title: 2025年9月及之后的国内新冠疫情中期展望
title_zh: 2025年9月及之后的国内新冠疫情中期展望-后大流行时期的生活429
summary_en: The article reviews China's COVID-19 situation from early 2025 to September, analyzing dominant variants and regional peaks. It predicts that from September to November 2025, NB.1.8.1 and PQ.2 sublineages will remain dominant, with PQ.2 gradually increasing. By late 2025 to early 2026, other variants such as XFG might emerge but are unlikely to dominate immediately. Regional differences remain significant, with north and south experiencing different peak timings and fluctuations due to climate factors.
summary_zh: 文章回顾了2025年初至9月国内新冠疫情的发展，分析了主要流行株及区域达峰情况。预测9月至11月NB.1.8.1及其亚分支与PQ.2系仍为主要流行株，PQ.2占比或将逐渐上升。至2025年底至2026年初，XFG等新株可能出现但短期难以占主导。区域差异显著，北方与南方在气候影响下出现不同的高峰与波动。
best_quote_en: From September to November 2025, NB.1.8.1 and its sublineages along with PQ.2 will remain dominant, while PQ.2 is expected to gradually increase and potentially replace NB.1.8.1.
best_quote_zh: 2025年9月至11月，我国大陆地区仍将以NB.1.8.1及其亚分支和PQ.2系为主要流行株，随着时间推移，PQ.2占比可能持续升高并取代NB.1.8.1。
